Shay Grinfeld, Vice President of Corporate and Business Development

Shay Grinfeld joined WebCollage in February of 2006 and is the Vice President of Corporate and Business Development. Shay brings more than ten years of experience in business development, sales and general management of early and late-stage companies.

Prior to WebCollage, Shay was CEO of e-Glue USA, Inc., a CRM software company and subsidiary of e-Glue Business Technologies.

Shay also worked at Alfy, an Internet-based new media educational company, as Vice President of Product Development.

Before Arriving to the US, Shay served in the Israeli Air Force as an F-16 fighter pilot.

Shay holds a Bachelor of Arts from Fairleigh Dickinson University and an Executive MBA from Columbia Business School.
